experience.title: Quantitative Analyst
experience.description: Writing quantitative trading algorithms and back-testing to generate alpha.-Extracting, analyzing and interpreting a variety of data-Analyse large financial data sets to identify trading opportunities-Design, back-testing and implementation of strategies
experience.description_html: Writing quantitative trading algorithms and back-testing to generate alpha.-Extracting, analyzing and interpreting a variety of data-Analyse large financial data sets to identify trading opportunities-Design, back-testing and implementation of strategies <!---->

experience.title: Quantative Research Consultant
experience.description: Using Quantitative approach and developing Trading Algorithms (alpha) to deploy systematic investment strategies focused on market inefficiencies across a variety of asset classes and global markets. Researching financial literature to seek out sources of alpha and aggregating these signals into robust models, with the objective of achieving high Sharpe ratios and significant abnormal returns.Using advanced mathematical and statistical techniques to model and predict market movements and develop quantitative strategies for efficiently trading equities.
experience.description_html: Using Quantitative approach and developing Trading Algorithms (alpha) to deploy systematic investment strategies focused on market inefficiencies across a variety of asset classes and global markets. Researching financial literature to seek out sources of alpha and aggregating these signals into robust models, with the objective of achieving high Sharpe ratios and significant abnormal returns.Using advanced mathematical and statistical techniques to model and predict market movements and develop quantitative strategies for efficiently trading equities.
